page.title: 03Religion-Broughton/Holt
page.content: This area is served by three churches. ANGLICAN CHURCH The churches of Holt,Chalfield and Broughton Gifford share a rector, the present incumbent being the Rev. Reuben Dunning. Only the churches of St. Mary BG. and All Saints Chalfield (see TOURISM) are in the area surveyed. METHODIST CHURCH The first Chapel was built in 1828, at this time the Rev. TR Jones had five members. The present Chapel was built in 1907 and the present incumbent is Rev. G Nuttall. BAPTIST CHURCH Around the year 1780 meetings were held in a clubroom at the rear of The Bell Inn. The present Chapel was erected in 1806 and the present Pastor is Cliff Mortimer.
